snippet: Bode Miller said he had not yet decided whether to retire after a season-ending crash Thursday in the men’s super-G at the Alpine world championships.
abstract: Bode Miller undergoes hamstring surgery; has yet to say whether he plans to retire following season-ending crash at Alpine world championships.
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller said he had not yet decided whether to retire after a season-ending crash Thursday in the men’s super-G at the Alpine world championships.
